title: European Trivia
bullets: Vatican City is the world's smallest country at just 0.17 square miles
The longest place name in Europe is Llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch in Wales
Europe has no active deserts, but it once had the world's largest desert during the Ice Age
The first university in Europe was founded in Bologna, Italy in 1088
The Channel Tunnel between UK and France is the world's longest undersea tunnel at 31 miles
